title: Channel That Restlessness Into Leg Power!
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>You always have so much power, Setsuna-san. Do you do anything to build up your stamina?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yes, I make it a routine to run while listening to songs I like<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Running, huh~.... I’m kind of bad at it....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>In my case, I run while listening to the soundtracks of anime I like. When I hear the soundtrack, my favorite scenes come to mind, and before I know it, I’m sprinting with all my might.... Maybe it’s more that I can’t control my urges.... Don’t you have something like that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Hmm.... For me, when I listen to a song of a school idol I like, I get all restless<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>That’s it! You should also run while listening to songs you like, Hanayo-san. You can channel that restlessness into leg power!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I-, I see! Then I might be able to do it too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Fufu, just be careful that you don’t wound up singing them<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ahaha, that’s right, huh. Don’t sing and focus the power into my leg, right♪ Thank you, Setsuna-san. I’ll work hard to build up my stamina<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I’m looking forward to seeing your powered-up performance, Hanayo-san. I shall run two soundtracks to keep up with you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
